lines.text: You can't have my name, it's a breach of security.
You know, I'm risking my life for you so I want a name, give me a name, I don't care. Any name!

[wondering why Lieser would want to be part of the mission]
Why would he do it?
Biology. Men change their politics but sex, sex is something you can depend upon.
But the gun. Sending a man with a gun across the border is an act of war.
You are spies? That's wonderful. I've never been a spy before. It will be a new experience for me.

[attacking Lieser from behind]
Never trust anybody.
